meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>dedicate</kanji> your entire <kanji>supply</kanji> of food to the gods it's called an <vocabulary>offering</vocabulary>, and it takes real <vocabulary>dedication</vocabulary> to do something like that.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
